name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 5th Birthday Live ＂DESTiNATiON -ちいさな心が行く先-＂【#AZKi生誕ライブ2023】 [e3JBtoh9pOQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs 'in this world' on a grand stage with multiple screens displaying visuals.
Transition scene with a title card for the next song.
AZKi begins performing 'I Like the You Inside the Screen' with anime visuals in the background.
scenes.song_name: 画面の中の君が好き (I Like the You Inside the Screen)

subtitles.original: 歌うことが正しいかなんて
subtitles.english: Whether singing is the right thing to do...

subtitles.original: 今も答えは見つからないけど
subtitles.english: ...I still haven't found the answer yet.

subtitles.original: 確かなのは君がいたから
subtitles.english: What is certain is that because you were there...

subtitles.original: 私はここにいるの
subtitles.english: ...I am here now.

subtitles.original: 何回何十回だって
subtitles.english: No matter how many tens of times,

subtitles.original: 君と出会うから
subtitles.english: I'll meet you again.

subtitles.original: 夜が明けてゆく 光が降り注ぎ
subtitles.english: The night is dawning, light is pouring down.

subtitles.original: 喜び悲しみを携え前を向く
subtitles.english: Carrying joy and sorrow, I look forward.

subtitles.original: 君と生きてく ここでこの場所で
subtitles.english: I'll live with you here, in this place.

subtitles.original: それが私の世界だ
subtitles.english: That is my world.

subtitles.original: その一秒一瞬が煌めく
subtitles.english: Every second, every moment shines.

subtitles.original: 過去が虹を壊したとしても
subtitles.english: Even if the past destroyed the rainbow,

subtitles.original: 夢が街を暗く落とそうとしても
subtitles.english: even if dreams try to darken the town,

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だから そばにいるよ
subtitles.english: it's okay, because I'm by your side.

subtitles.original: 君に笑ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: I want you to smile.

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味を探しているの
subtitles.english: I'm looking for the meaning of my birth.

subtitles.original: 転んでもただ走り続けていく
subtitles.english: Even if I fall, I'll just keep running.

subtitles.original: 今を知って 明日を願った
subtitles.english: Knowing the present, I wished for tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 心が叫びたがってる
subtitles.english: My heart wants to scream.

subtitles.original: タイムマシンに乗ってさ 別の未来を選べたのなら
subtitles.english: If I could take a time machine and choose a different future,

subtitles.original: 君のいない世界を想像する？
subtitles.english: would I imagine a world without you?

subtitles.original: そんな世界は想像できない
subtitles.english: I can't imagine such a world.

subtitles.original: 君に届きますように この声が この歌が
subtitles.english: I hope this voice, this song reaches you.

subtitles.original: 何回何十回だって 君を選ぶから
subtitles.english: No matter how many tens of times, I'll choose you.

subtitles.original: 夜が滲んでゆく 地平の彼方へ
subtitles.english: The night is blurring towards the horizon.

subtitles.original: 響く呼吸の音 確かに感じた
subtitles.english: I certainly felt the sound of echoing breath.

subtitles.original: 始めよう 君との未来を
subtitles.english: Let's begin the future with you.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ手を離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go of my held hand.

subtitles.original: 大きな声で名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Call my name in a loud voice.

subtitles.original: 奇跡を駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Run through miracles.

subtitles.original: どこまでも行けるよ
subtitles.english: We can go anywhere.

subtitles.original: ここからもう一度 君と私で始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's start over from here, you and I.

subtitles.original: 無限の中に生まれる物語を
subtitles.english: A story born in infinity,

subtitles.original: 君と歩いていく
subtitles.english: I'll walk it with you.

subtitles.original: この世界が悲しみに溢れたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if this world is filled with sadness,

subtitles.original: 私は歌を歌い続けていく
subtitles.english: I'll keep on singing songs.

subtitles.original: 君と生きてく ここでこの場所で
subtitles.english: I'll live with you here, in this place.

subtitles.original: それが私の世界だ
subtitles.english: That is my world.

subtitles.original: その一秒一瞬が煌めく
subtitles.english: Every second, every moment shines.

subtitles.original: 傷つき涙を流す君が 幸せだと思える世界になりますように
subtitles.english: I hope the world becomes a place where even when you're hurt and crying, you can feel happy.

subtitles.original: 願いを込め歌う
subtitles.english: I sing with this wish.

subtitles.original: 画面の中の君が好き
subtitles.english: I Like the You Inside the Screen

subtitles.original: 君を初めて見つけた時
subtitles.english: When I first found you,

subtitles.original: なぜか心 揺さぶられたんだ
subtitles.english: for some reason, my heart was shaken.

subtitles.original: 作り物に命を宿す 君の輝きは本物だった
subtitles.english: Breathing life into a fabrication, your brilliance was real.

subtitles.original: 楽しそうな君は素敵だった
subtitles.english: You looked so happy, it was wonderful.

subtitles.original: 画面の中の君が好き
subtitles.english: I like the you inside the screen.

subtitles.original: 画面の中の君が好き
subtitles.english: I like the you inside the screen.

subtitles.original: 画面の中の君が好き
subtitles.english: I like the you inside the screen.

subtitles.original: ただ君が変われたらいい
subtitles.english: I just wish you could change.

subtitles.original: 本当の君と実は違うとしても
subtitles.english: Even if you're actually different from the real you.

subtitles.original: 新しい扉を開けて 息をしようよ
subtitles.english: Open a new door and let's take a breath.

subtitles.original: 嘘も本当も関係ないから
subtitles.english: Because lies and truth don't matter.

subtitles.original: 息をしている瞬間を僕ら
subtitles.english: The moments we are breathing, we...
